Package community.leaf.textchain.adventure

Class LegacyTextChain

java.lang.Object
community.leaf.textchain.adventure.Chain<LegacyTextChain>
community.leaf.textchain.adventure.LegacyTextChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChainedAudienceSender<LegacyTextChain>, ComponentLike
public final class LegacyTextChain extends Chain<LegacyTextChain>
A text chain that will automatically process legacy ampersand-style color codes in text (like "&3&o"). Appended text is processed using: TextProcessor.legacyAmpersand(String). To append text without processing color codes, simply use Chain.thenUnprocessed(String).

    LegacyTextChain​(WrappedTextComponentBuilder builder)
    Make a new LegacyTextChain, but TextChain.legacy() is better.
